definition: modal particle indicating indicating lack of enthusiasm/modal particle indicating that things should only or can only be done a certain way
to chant/see 梵唄|梵呗[fan4 bai4]
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
Ant Check Later, consumer credit service offered by Ant Financial Services 螞蟻金服|蚂蚁金服[Ma3 yi3 Jin1 fu2]

sentences.english: Said a little voice. They're jus pants.
sentences.chinese: 腦子裏一個細細的聲音說道，就一條褲子唄。

sentences.english: Lily: It's because of the greenhouse effect, and these islands belong to Maldives.
sentences.chinese: 因爲溫室效應唄，這些島嶼是屬於馬爾代夫的。

sentences.english: It's because of the greenhouse effect, and these islands belong to Maldives.
sentences.chinese: 因爲溫室效應唄，這些島嶼是屬於馬爾代夫的。

sentences.english: That means you'll have double happiness.
sentences.chinese: 那就說明你會雙喜臨門唄。
保持神祕感唄，給的越少，留給想象的空間就越大。

sentences.english: Say white, be foster sensibilities Bai in advance.
sentences.chinese: 說白了，就是提前培養感情唄。

sentences.english: Just keeping alive, M' Coy said.
The master is too lazy to go up the mountain and he can't see us, so let's eat boldly.
sentences.chinese: 主人懶得上山來，他又看不見，咱們放開肚子喫唄。

sentences.english: At most the verdict may be the halt of crimes.
Me? Just working. This job has been keeping me busy.
sentences.chinese: 我？就是工作唄。最近工作都把我忙得不行。

sentences.english: "I'm thick-skinned, " I said, though the truth was more complicated.
sentences.chinese: “我皮厚唄，”我說，事實論起來複雜的多。

definition: what are you doing?/whatever for?/why on earth?
(final particle equivalent to 了[le5])/(particle calling attention to, or mildly warning of, a situation)
original poster (in an online forum)/landlord of a building (traditional)
mythical horse/Internet slang for 什麼|什么[shen2 me5]
Correct!/Oh, that's right, ... (when one suddenly remembers sth one wanted to mention)/Oh, by the way, ...
to come to an agreement/to complete negotiations
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
